name: Medusa wants to play with cats
name_original: Medusa wants to play with cats
description:
Guide Medusa to the sunglasses on each level, turning as few cats as possible into unpassable statues.

Created between 2:00 AM - 2:00 AM November 5 2017 for 0h Game Jam
